targets.sql: SELECT Sum(`request`) AS `Sum(request)`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(region_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(region_1) AS `server_icon_id`, region_id_1, region_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND pod_ns_1 = 'dubbo-application' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, region_1, region_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 100

SELECT Avg(`client_error_ratio`) AS `Avg(client_error_ratio)`, node_type(region_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(region_1) AS `server_icon_id`, region_id_1, region_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_1 = 'dubbo-application' AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY region_1, region_id_1, `server_node_type` LIMIT 100

SELECT Avg(`server_error_ratio`) AS `Avg(server_error_ratio)`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(region_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(region_1) AS `server_icon_id`, region_id_1, region_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_1 = 'dubbo-application' AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, region_1, region_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT PerSecond(Avg(`request`)) AS `request_rate`, Avg(`rrt`) AS `delay_avg`, Max(`rrt_max`) AS `delay_max`, Sum(`server_error`) AS `server_error_sum`, Avg(`timeout`) AS `time_out`, node_type(auto_service_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_service_id_0, auto_service_0, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1, Enum(tap_side), tap_side FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY auto_service_0, auto_service_1, tap_side, auto_service_id_0, auto_service_id_1, `client_node_type`, `server_node_type` LIMIT 1000

SELECT Sum(`client_error`) AS `Sum(client_error)`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(region_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(region_1) AS `server_icon_id`, region_id_1, region_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_1 = 'dubbo-application' AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, region_1, region_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 100

SELECT Sum(`server_error`) AS `Sum(server_error)`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(region_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(region_1) AS `server_icon_id`, region_id_1, region_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_1 = 'dubbo-application' AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, region_1, region_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Avg(`rtt`) AS `TCP Round Trip Duration`, Avg(`art`) AS `Data Transfer Duration`, Avg(`rrt`) AS `App Duration`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(pod_cluster) AS `node_type`, icon_id(pod_cluster) AS `icon_id`, pod_cluster_id, pod_cluster FROM vtap_flow_port WHERE pod_cluster_id!=0 AND pod_ns_id!=0 AND auto_service_id!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, pod_cluster, pod_cluster_id, `node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 100

SELECT Sum(`request`) AS `Request Sum`, Avg(`response_duration`) AS `Delay Avg`, Percentile(`response_duration`,0.75) AS `Delay P75`, Percentile(`response_duration`,0.9) AS `Delay P90`, Percentile(`response_duration`,0.99) AS `Delay P99`, Avg(`client_error_ratio`) AS `Client Error Ratio`, Avg(`server_error_ratio`) AS `Server Error Ratio`, auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id` FROM l7_flow_log WHERE (auto_service_id_0!=0 OR auto_service_id_1!=0) AND (pod_ns_id_0!=0 OR pod_ns_id_1!=0) AND (pod_cluster_id_0!=0 OR pod_cluster_id_1!=0) AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` LIMIT 1000

SELECT PerSecond(Avg(`request`)) AS `PerSecond(Avg(request))`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(auto_instance_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_instance_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE l7_protocol IN (40) AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, auto_instance_0, auto_instance_id_0, `client_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Sum(`request`) AS `request`, node_type(auto_instance_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_instance_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE l7_protocol IN (40) AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY auto_instance_0, auto_instance_id_0, `client_node_type` LIMIT 10

SELECT PerSecond(Avg(`response`)) AS `response`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE l7_protocol IN (40) AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Sum(`response`) AS `response`, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE l7_protocol IN (40) AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` LIMIT 10

SELECT Percentile(`rrt`,0.9) AS `P90`, time(time, 1) AS `time_1`, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_1`, auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Percentile(`rrt`,0.95) AS `P95`, time(time, 1) AS `time_1`, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_1`, auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Percentile(`rrt`,0.99) AS `P99`, time(time, 1) AS `time_1`, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_1`, auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Percentile(`rrt`,0.9) AS `P90`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(auto_instance_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_instance_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, auto_instance_0, auto_instance_id_0, `client_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Sum(`server_error`) AS `error`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Sum(`client_error`) AS `error`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(auto_instance_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_instance_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, auto_instance_0, auto_instance_id_0, `client_node_type` SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 1000

SELECT Sum(`server_error`) AS `server_error`, node_type(auto_instance_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_instance_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE l7_protocol IN (40) AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY auto_instance_0, auto_instance_id_0, `client_node_type` ORDER BY `server_error` desc LIMIT 10

SELECT Sum(`client_error`) AS `client_error`, node_type(auto_instance_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_instance_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE l7_protocol IN (40) AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY auto_instance_0, auto_instance_id_0, `client_node_type` ORDER BY `client_error` desc LIMIT 10

SELECT Sum(`timeout`) AS `time_out`, node_type(auto_instance_0) AS `client_node_type`, icon_id(auto_instance_0) AS `client_icon_id`, auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_0 FROM vtap_app_edge_port WHERE l7_protocol IN (40) AND pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY auto_instance_0, auto_instance_id_0, `client_node_type` ORDER BY `time_out` desc LIMIT 10

SELECT Sum(`log_count`) AS `Log Count`, response_code AS `Code`, response_exception AS `Message` FROM l7_flow_log WHERE pod_cluster_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND response_code NOT IN (20) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `Code`, `Message` ORDER BY `Log Count` desc LIMIT 100

SELECT Sum(`log_count`) AS `Sum(log_count)`, endpoint FROM l7_flow_log WHERE pod_cluster_id_1!=0 AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY endpoint ORDER BY `Sum(log_count)` desc LIMIT 10

SELECT Sum(`log_count`) AS `Sum(log_count)`, time(time, 60) AS `time_60`, node_type(auto_service_1) AS `server_node_type`, icon_id(auto_service_1) AS `server_icon_id`, auto_service_id_1, auto_service_1 FROM l7_flow_log WHERE pod_cluster_1 = 'k8s-d-5Us8Lds7Co' AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' GROUP BY `time_60`, auto_service_1, auto_service_id_1, `server_node_type` ORDER BY `Sum(log_count)` desc SLIMIT 20 LIMIT 100

SELECT `response_duration` AS `Response Delay`, auto_instance_0, auto_instance_1, Enum(tap_side) AS `Tap Side`, request_type AS `Method`, request_resource, Enum(response_status) AS `Status`, toString(start_time) AS `Start Time`, toString(_id), auto_instance_id_0, auto_instance_id_1 FROM l7_flow_log WHERE tap_port_type IN (7,8) AND pod_cluster_id_1!=0 AND pod_ns_id_1!=0 AND auto_service_id_1!=0 AND l7_protocol IN (40) AND time>='${__from:date:seconds}' AND time<='${__to:date:seconds}' and `response_duration`>='100000' ORDER BY `Response Delay` desc LIMIT 1000

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE l7_protocol=40 and time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999","useAny":true,"useDisabled":false}
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster

query.sql: SELECT pod_cluster as `value`, pod_cluster as `display_name` FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE l7_protocol=40 and time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT pod_ns as value, pod_ns as display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE l7_protocol=40 AND ('$cluster' IN ('__disabled')  OR  '$cluster' IN ('__any')  OR pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})) AND  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999","useAny":true,"useDisabled":false}
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

query.sql: SELECT pod_ns as value, pod_ns as display_name FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE l7_protocol=40 AND ('$cluster' IN ('__disabled')  OR  '$cluster' IN ('__any')  OR pod_cluster IN (${cluster:singlequote})) AND  time >= ${__from:date:seconds} AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999

list.definition: {"database":"flow_metrics","sql":"SELECT auto_service AS `value` , auto_service AS `display_name` FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE l7_protocol=40 AND auto_service_type IN (101,102) AND ('$namespace' IN ('__disabled')  OR  '$namespace' IN ('__any')  OR pod_ns IN (${namespace:singlequote})) AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999","useAny":true,"useDisabled":false}
list.label: Dubbo Service
list.name: service

query.sql: SELECT auto_service AS `value` , auto_service AS `display_name` FROM `vtap_app_port.1m` WHERE l7_protocol=40 AND auto_service_type IN (101,102) AND ('$namespace' IN ('__disabled')  OR  '$namespace' IN ('__any')  OR pod_ns IN (${namespace:singlequote})) AND time <= ${__to:date:seconds} GROUP BY `value` LIMIT 999999999999
